survivors.name: Nick
survivors.description: Nick's sarcasm, pessimism, and self-centered cynicism arguably make him the most antagonistic character, or anti-hero, in the series.
survivors.phrase: Name's Nick. But don't worry about learning it, 'cause I ain't sticking around long.

survivors.name: Rochelle
survivors.description: Rochelle plays the role of the 'big sister' of the group, and almost everyone treats her with generous respect.
survivors.phrase: My name's Rochelle. I produce a news show.

survivors.name: Coach
survivors.description: Coach is the eldest, voice of reason, and authority of the Left 4 Dead 2 team, playing a similar role to Bill in Left 4 Dead.
survivors.phrase: I ain't gonna die waitin' on salvation. As long as we still got guns, we gonna fight.

survivors.name: Ellis
survivors.description: Ellis' irrepressible optimism leads to some mixed relationships with the other team members, who cannot figure out whether Ellis is genuinely oblivious to the danger they face or has a highly resilient, strong-willed personality which he chooses to mask behind a lighthearted surface persona.
survivors.phrase: Kill all sons of bitches. That's my official instructions.

survivors.name: Zoey
survivors.description: Zoey was once a student at Aldrich in Philadelphia under a scholarship to become a filmmaker but instead of attending classes, she spent her time watching horror films and justified this to her upset mother as doing some 'research'.
survivors.phrase: Funny, sexy, brunette zombie killer wanted to lead three helpless men to safety.
